tituloFijo: First you will need a Wallet

bloques.texto: Imagine a digital wallet on your phone that, instead of storing money or credit cards, stores verifiable credentials. Think of them as important documents, but in a secure digital format (ID, passport, diplomas, etc.).

Verifiable credential wallets give users full control over their data. You decide what information to share and with whom. For example, if you only need to prove your age to access a service, you just share your date of birth without revealing your entire identity.
First, install one of the compatible applications on your smartphone. You can view the QR code by tapping on the icons.

Scan this QR code with your phone or use the store buttons. You can also search for Procivis in your app store.
Complete the process in the app.
